titleStmt.title: A pleasant new ballad of King Edward the fourth, and a tanner of Tamworth, as he rode a hunting with his nobles to Drayton Basset. To an excellent new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
